description: This table extracts the response status (examples: whether the query was read, reply type, and timestamp) of the secondary recipients of the query.

columns.name: QUERY_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the query record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this contact. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this contact.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: ADDL_RESP_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the non-primary responding users of the query.

columns.name: ADDL_RESPONSE_C_NAME
columns.description:
Stores the non-most recent responses of the query.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Not Read


Read


Ask Later


Agree


Disagree


Decline


Clinically Undetermined

columns.name: ADDL_RESP_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the non-most recent response instant of the query in UTC.

columns.name: QUERY_CSN_ID
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the contact.
